verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> there this <S%H1697>word,<s%>

<S%H559>Say,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who <S%H3427>sits<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H5650>you,<s%> and your servants, and your <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H935>enter<s%> in by these <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H6213>Execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him who is <S%H1497>robbed<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6216>oppressor:<s%> and do no <S%H3238>wrong,<s%> do no <S%H2554>violence,<s%> to the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> nor the <S%H490>widow;<s%> neither <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

For if you <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H6213>indeed,<s%> then shall there enter <S%H935>in<s%> by the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H5650>he,<s%> and his servants, and his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

But if you will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> these <S%H1697>words,<s%> I <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H5002>myself,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that this <S%H1004>house<s%> shall become a <S%H2723>desolation.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> You are <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> to <S%H7218>me,<s%> the head of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%> Yet surely I will <S%H7896>make<s%> you a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are not <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>

I will <S%H6942>prepare<s%> <S%H7843>destroyers<s%> against <S%H376>you,<s%> everyone with his <S%H3627>weapons;<s%> and they shall cut <S%H3772>down<s%> your <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H730>cedars,<s%> and <S%H5307>cast<s%> them into the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> by this <S%H5892>city,<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> Why has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> thus to this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city?<s%>

Then they shall <S%H559>answer,<s%> Because they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and served <S%H5647>them.<s%>

<S%H1058>Don't<s%> weep for the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> neither <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> <S%H1058>him;<s%> but weep <S%H1058>bitterly<s%> for him who goes <S%H1980>away;<s%> for he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> no <S%H7200>more,<s%> nor see his <S%H4138>native<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H413>touching<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who <S%H4427>reigned<s%> instead of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and who went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of this <S%H4725>place:<s%> He shall not return there any <S%H7725>more.<s%>
But in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they have led him <S%H1540>captive,<s%> there shall he <S%H4191>die,<s%> and he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> this land no <S%H776>more.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him who <S%H1129>builds<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3808>by<s%> <S%H6664>unrighteousness,<s%> and his <S%H5944>rooms<s%> by <S%H4941>injustice;<s%> who uses his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H5647>service<s%> without <S%H2600>wages,<s%> and <S%H5414>doesn't<s%> give him his <S%H6467>hire;<s%>

who <S%H559>says,<s%> I will <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H4060>wide<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H7304>spacious<s%> <S%H5944>rooms,<s%> and cuts him <S%H7167>out<s%> <S%H2474>windows;<s%> and it is <S%H5603>ceiling<s%> with <S%H730>cedar,<s%> and <S%H4886>painted<s%> with <S%H8350>vermilion.<s%>

Shall you <S%H4427>reign,<s%> because you strive to <S%H8474>excel<s%> in <S%H730>cedar?<s%> <S%H1>Didn't<s%> your father <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness?<s%> then it was well with <S%H2896>him.<s%>
He <S%H1777>judged<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy;<s%> then it was <S%H2896>well.<s%> <S%H1847>Wasn't<s%> this to know <S%H5002>me?<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

But your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and your <S%H3820>heart<s%> are not but for your <S%H1215>covetousness,<s%> and for <S%H8210>shedding<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and for <S%H6233>oppression,<s%> and for <S%H4835>violence,<s%> to do <S%H6213>it.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> they shall not <S%H5594>lament<s%> for <S%H1945>him,<s%> saying, Ah my <S%H251>brother!<s%> <S%H1945>or,<s%> Ah <S%H269>sister!<s%> They shall not <S%H5594>lament<s%> for <S%H1945>him,<s%> saying Ah <S%H113>lord!<s%> <S%H1945>or,<s%> Ah his <S%H1935>glory!<s%>

He shall be <S%H6912>buried<s%> with the <S%H6900>burial<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> <S%H5498>drawn<s%> and cast <S%H7993>forth<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and <S%H6817>cry;<s%> and lift <S%H5414>up<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H6817>cry<s%> from <S%H5676>Abarim;<s%> for all your <S%H157>lovers<s%> are <S%H7665>destroyed.<s%>

I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you in your <S%H7962>prosperity;<s%> but you <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H8085>hear.<s%> This has been your <S%H1870>way<s%> from your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> that you <S%H8085>didn't<s%> obey my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

The <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> all your <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and your <S%H157>lovers<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity:<s%> surely then you will be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for all your <S%H7451>wickedness.<s%>

<S%H3427>Inhabitant<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> who makes your <S%H7077>nest<s%> in the <S%H730>cedars,<s%> how greatly to be <S%H2603>pitied<s%> you will be when <S%H2256>pangs<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H2427>you,<s%> the pain as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail!<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> though <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were the <S%H2368>signet<s%> on my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> yet would I pluck you <S%H5423>there;<s%>

and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H5315>life,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them of <S%H6440>whom<s%> you are <S%H3016>afraid,<s%> even into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>

I will cast you <S%H2904>out,<s%> and your <S%H517>mother<s%> who <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H312>you,<s%> into another <S%H776>country,<s%> where you were not <S%H3205>born;<s%> and there you will <S%H4191>die.<s%>
But to the <S%H776>land<s%> whereunto their soul <S%H5375>longs<s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> there shall they not <S%H7725>return.<s%>

Is this <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> a <S%H959>despised<s%> <S%H5310>broken<s%> <S%H6089>vessel?<s%> is he a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> in which none <S%H2656>delights?<s%> why are they cast <S%H7993>out,<s%> he and his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and are <S%H2904>cast<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which they <S%H3045>don't<s%> know?
O <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> you this <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6185>childless,<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> who shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3117>days;<s%> for no more shall a <S%H376>man<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H4910>ruling<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
